name: DecompilerHighlighter
comment:
The highlighter interface passed to clients of the DecompilerHighlightService.

 The expected workflow for this class is:  create the highlighter, clients
 will request highlights via #applyHighlights(), clients will clear highlights via
 #clearHighlights() and the highlighter may be removed via #dispose().
javadoc:
The highlighter interface passed to clients of the {@link DecompilerHighlightService}.

The expected workflow for this class is: create the highlighter, clients will request highlights via {@link #applyHighlights()}, clients will clear highlights via {@link #clearHighlights()} and the highlighter may be removed via {@link #dispose()}.

methods.name: applyHighlights
methods.comment: Call this method when you wish to apply your highlights.
methods.javadoc: Call this method when you wish to apply your highlights.

methods.name: clearHighlights
methods.comment: Call this method when you wish to remove your highlights.
methods.javadoc: Call this method when you wish to remove your highlights.

methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Call this method to remove your highlighter from the Decompiler.
methods.javadoc: Call this method to remove your highlighter from the Decompiler.

methods.name: getId
methods.comment:
Returns the ID used by this highlighter.  This will either be generated by this API or
 supplied by the client.
